How to Fill Out the Common App

Step 1: Create an Account

Visit www.commonapp.org and click "Create an Account". Fill in your basic information and set up your login credentials.

Step 2: Complete Your Profile

Fill out the sections in your profile, including:

  • Personal Information
  • Contact Details
  • Family Background
  • Education History

Step 3: Add Colleges

Search for the colleges you wish to apply to and add them to your list. Review each college's specific requirements.

Step 4: Write Your Personal Essay

Use the essay prompts provided by the Common App. Write and upload your personal essay, ensuring it highlights your unique story and strengths.

Step 5: Complete Supplemental Questions

Check each college's requirements for additional essays or questions and fill them out carefully.

Step 6: Request Recommendations

Invite your teachers, counselors, or mentors to submit letters of recommendation through the Common App.

Step 7: Review and Submit

Double-check all the information and documents in your application. Once youâ€™re confident, pay the application fee (or request a fee waiver) and submit your application.
